comments.text:
> Created attachment 561281 [details]
> Another screenshot

This I *can* reproduce (testing with FF 6.0.2 on OS X 10.6.8).

But it's quite a different problem from that of your original screenshot, and I'm not sure it's really a bug.

Your original screenshot showed (I think) a truncated (vertical) scroll-bar thumb.  If that's really what happened, it's clearly a bug.  But I can't reproduce it.

Your second screenshot shows that, when the window reaches a minimum horizontal size, the vertical scrollbar gradually gets masked away as you continue to reduce its size (horizontally).  This is different from what happens when the window reaches a minimum vertical size -- in that case the horizontal scrollbar suddenly disappears (without ever being partially masked).

Do these behaviors also happen on other platforms (like Windows or Linux)?
